---
title: "Stop experiments"
description: "Roll your experiment out once you accepted or rejected the hypothesis"
---

Once the statistical significance is reached, you can end the experiment using the **End** button. Once you click on it, Qonversion:

* Stops returning variant-related payload to your app.
* Stops attributing events generated by exposed users to the experiment.

![](/guides/images/docs/8c85230-Screenshot_2023-09-27_at_16.55.43.png)
